145 //Euclidean cosine law
146 //template<typename M, typename V, typename E, typename F, typename H>
147 template< class M, class V, class E, class F, class H > // Added by Dillon 2017/08/22
148 double CStructure<M,V,E,F,H>::_cosine_law( double a, double b, double c )
149 {
150  double cs = ( a*a + b * b - c * c )/( 2.0 * a * b );
151  assert( cs <= 1.0 && cs >= -1.0 );
152  return acos( cs );
153 };

156 //Calculate corner angle
157 //template<typename M, typename V, typename E, typename F, typename H>
158 template< class M, class V, class E, class F, class H > // Added by Dillon 2017/08/22
159 void CStructure<M, V,E,F,H>::_metric_2_angle( )
160 {
161 
162  for ( typename M::MeshFaceIterator fiter( m_pMesh); ! fiter.end(); fiter ++ )
163  {
164  F * f = *fiter;
165 
166  H * he[3];
167 
168  he[0] = m_pMesh->faceMostCcwHalfEdge( f );
169 
170  for( int i = 0; i < 3; i ++ )
171  {
172  he[(i+1)%3] = m_pMesh-> faceNextCcwHalfEdge(he[i]);
173  }
174 
175  double l[3];
176  for(int i = 0; i < 3; i ++ )
177  {
178  E * e = m_pMesh->halfedgeEdge( he[i] );
179  l[i] = e->length();
180  }
181 
182  for(int i = 0; i < 3; i ++ )
183  {
184  he[(i+1)%3]->angle() = _cosine_law( l[(i+1)%3] ,l[(i+2)%3] ,l[i] );
185  }
186  }
187 };
188 
189 //template<typename M, typename V, typename E, typename F, typename H>
190 template< class M, class V, class E, class F, class H > // Added by Dillon 2017/08/22
191 void CStructure<M, V,E,F,H>::_embedding_2_metric( )
192 {
193 
194  for ( typename M::MeshEdgeIterator eiter( m_pMesh); ! eiter.end(); eiter ++ )
195  {
196  E * e = *eiter;
197  V * v1 = m_pMesh->edgeVertex1( e );
198  V * v2 = m_pMesh->edgeVertex2( e );
199  e->length() = (v1->point()-v2->point()).norm();
200  }
201 };

205 //Calculate vertex curvature
206 //template<typename M, typename V, typename E, typename F, typename H>
207 template< class M, class V, class E, class F, class H > // Added by Dillon 2017/08/22
208 void CStructure<M, V,E,F,H>::_angle_2_curvature( )
209 {
210 
211  for( typename M::MeshVertexIterator viter( m_pMesh ); !viter.end(); viter ++ )
212  {
213  V * v = *viter;
214  double k = (v->boundary() )? PI: PI * 2;
215  for( typename M::VertexInHalfedgeIterator vh( m_pMesh, v ); !vh.end(); ++vh )
216  {
217  H * he = *vh;
218  k -= he->angle();
219  }
220  v->k() = k;
221  }
222 
223 };
224 
225 
226 //Calculate vertex curvature
227 //template<typename M, typename V, typename E, typename F, typename H>
228 template< class M, class V, class E, class F, class H > // Added by Dillon 2017/08/22
229 void CStructure<M, V,E,F,H>::_angle_2_Laplace( )
230 {
231 
232  for( typename M::MeshEdgeIterator eiter( m_pMesh ); !eiter.end(); eiter ++ )
233  {
234  E * e = *eiter;
235 
236  H * he = m_pMesh->edgeHalfedge( e, 0 );
237  H * pNh = m_pMesh->faceNextCcwHalfEdge( he );
238 
239  double wt = cos( pNh->angle() )/sin( pNh->angle() );
240 
241  H * sh = m_pMesh->halfedgeSym( he );
242  if( sh != NULL )
243  {
244  pNh = m_pMesh->faceNextCcwHalfEdge( sh );
245  wt += cos( pNh->angle() )/sin( pNh->angle() );
246  }
247  e->weight() = wt;
248 
249  }
250 };
251 
252 //template<typename M, typename V, typename E, typename F, typename H>
253 template< class M, class V, class E, class F, class H > // Added by Dillon 2017/08/22
254 void CStructure<M, V,E,F,H>::_parameter_mu_2_metric( )
255 {
256  for ( typename M::MeshEdgeIterator eiter( m_pMesh); ! eiter.end(); eiter ++ )
257  {
258  E * e = *eiter;
259  V * v1 = m_pMesh->edgeVertex1( e );
260  V * v2 = m_pMesh->edgeVertex2( e );
261 
262  std::complex<double> z1 = v1->z();
263  std::complex<double> z2 = v2->z();
264 
265  std::complex<double> dz = z2 - z1;
266 
267  std::complex<double> mu1 = v1->mu();
268  std::complex<double> mu2 = v2->mu();
269  std::complex<double> mu = (mu1 + mu2)/2.0;
270 
271  e->length() = std::abs( dz + mu * std::conj( dz ));
272  }
273 
274  for ( typename M::MeshFaceIterator fiter( m_pMesh); ! fiter.end(); fiter ++ )
275  {
276  F * f = *fiter;
277 
278  H * he[3];
279 
280  he[0] = m_pMesh->faceMostCcwHalfEdge( f );
281 
282  for( int i = 0; i < 3; i ++ )
283  {
284  he[(i+1)%3] = m_pMesh-> faceNextCcwHalfEdge(he[i]);
285  }
286 
287  double l[3];
288  for(int i = 0; i < 3; i ++ )
289  {
290  E * e = m_pMesh->halfedgeEdge( he[i] );
291  l[i] = e->length();
292  }
293 
294  for( int i = 0; i < 3; i ++ )
295  {
296  if( l[(i+1)%3] + l[(i+2)%3] < l[(i+0)%3] )
297  std::cerr << "Warning: Triangle Inequality is violated" << std::endl;
298  }
299  }
300 
301 };
302 
303 //template<typename M, typename V, typename E, typename F, typename H>
304 template< class M, class V, class E, class F, class H > // Added by Dillon 2017/08/22
305 int CStructure<M, V,E,F,H>::_circle_circle_intersection(double x0, double y0, double r0,
306  double x1, double y1, double r1,
307  double *xi, double *yi,
308  double *xi_prime, double *yi_prime)
309 {
310  double a, dx, dy, d, h, rx, ry;
311  double x2, y2;
312 
313  /* dx and dy are the vertical and horizontal distances between
314  * the circle centers.
315  */
316  dx = x1 - x0;
317  dy = y1 - y0;
318 
319  /* Determine the straight-line distance between the centers. */
320  d = sqrt((dy*dy) + (dx*dx));
321 
322  /* Check for solvability. */
323  if (d > (r0 + r1))
324  {
325  /* no solution. circles do not intersect. */
326  return 0;
327  }
328  if (d < abs(r0 - r1))
329  {
330  /* no solution. one circle is contained in the other */
331  return 0;
332  }
333 
334  /* 'point 2' is the point where the line through the circle
335  * intersection points crosses the line between the circle
336  * centers.
337  */
338 
339  /* Determine the distance from point 0 to point 2. */
340  a = ((r0*r0) - (r1*r1) + (d*d)) / (2.0 * d) ;
341 
342  /* Determine the coordinates of point 2. */
343  x2 = x0 + (dx * a/d);
344  y2 = y0 + (dy * a/d);
345 
346  /* Determine the distance from point 2 to either of the
347  * intersection points.
348  */
349  h = sqrt((r0*r0) - (a*a));
350 
351  /* Now determine the offsets of the intersection points from
352  * point 2.
353  */
354  rx = -dy * (h/d);
355  ry = dx * (h/d);
356 
357  /* Determine the absolute intersection points. */
358  *xi = x2 + rx;
359  *xi_prime = x2 - rx;
360  *yi = y2 + ry;
361  *yi_prime = y2 - ry;
362 
363  return 1;
364 };
365

367 //vertex A, vertex B are known, vertex C is unknown
368 
369 //template<typename M, typename V, typename E, typename F, typename H>
370 template< class M, class V, class E, class F, class H > // Added by Dillon 2017/08/22
371 bool CStructure<M, V,E,F,H>::_embed_third_vertex( M* pM, V * A, V * B, V * C )
372 {
373  //radius of the first circle
374  double r1 = pM->vertexEdge(A,C)->length();
375  //radius of the second circle
376  double r2 = pM->vertexEdge(B,C)->length();
377  //center of the first circle
378  CPoint2 c1 = A->huv();
379  //center of the second circle
380  CPoint2 c2 = B->huv();
381 
382 
383  CPoint2 i1;
384  CPoint2 i2;
385 
386  int result =_circle_circle_intersection( c1[0], c1[1], r1,
387  c2[0], c2[1], r2,
388  &i1[0], &i1[1],
389  &i2[0], &i2[1]);
390 
391 
392  if( result )
393  {
394  if( cross( c2-c1, i1 - c1 ) > 0 )
395  C->huv() = i1;
396  else
397  C->huv() = i2;
398  return true;
399  }
400 
401 
402  // This should never happen, once this happends,
403  // we use crude approximation
404 
405  if( ! result )
406  {
407  C->huv() = c1;
408  }
409 
410  return true;
411 };

413 //template<typename M, typename V, typename E, typename F, typename H>
414 template< class M, class V, class E, class F, class H > // Added by Dillon 2017/08/22
415 void CStructure<M, V,E,F,H>::_embed_two_faces( M * pM, E * pE )
416 {
417  H * pH = pM->edgeHalfedge( pE, 0 );
418  H * pN = pM->faceNextCcwHalfEdge( pH );
419  H * pD = pM->edgeHalfedge( pE, 1 );
420  H * pW = pM->faceNextCcwHalfEdge( pD );
421 
422  V * pS = pM->halfedgeSource( pH );
423  V * pT = pM->halfedgeTarget( pH );
424  V * pL = pM->halfedgeTarget( pN );
425  V * pR = pM->halfedgeTarget( pW );
426 
427  pS->huv() = CPoint2(0,0);
428  pT->huv() = CPoint2( pE->length(), 0 );
429  _embed_third_vertex( pM, pS, pT, pL );
430  _embed_third_vertex( pM, pT, pS, pR );
431 };
432 
433 //template<typename M, typename V, typename E, typename F, typename H>
434 template< class M, class V, class E, class F, class H > // Added by Dillon 2017/08/22
435 void CStructure<M, V,E,F,H>::_embed_one_face( M * pM, E * pE )
436 {
437  H * pH = pM->edgeHalfedge( pE, 0 );
438  H * pN = pM->faceNextCcwHalfEdge( pH );
439 
440  V * pS = pM->halfedgeSource( pH );
441  V * pT = pM->halfedgeTarget( pH );
442  V * pL = pM->halfedgeTarget( pN );
443 
444  pS->huv() = CPoint2(0,0);
445  pT->huv() = CPoint2( pE->length(), 0 );
446  _embed_third_vertex( pM, pS, pT, pL );
447 };

450 //template<typename M, typename V, typename E, typename F, typename H>
451 template< class M, class V, class E, class F, class H > // Added by Dillon 2017/08/22
452 std::complex<double> CStructure<M, V,E,F,H>::_diagonal_ratio( M* pM, E * pE )
453 {
454  std::complex<double > rho;
455 
456  if( pM->isBoundary( pE ))
457  {
458  _embed_one_face( pM, pE );
459 
460  H * pH = pM->edgeHalfedge( pE, 0 );
461  H * pN = pM->faceNextCcwHalfEdge( pH );
462 
463  V * pS = pM->halfedgeSource( pH );
464  V * pT = pM->halfedgeTarget( pH );
465  V * pL = pM->halfedgeTarget( pN );
466 
467  CPoint2 d0 = pT->huv() - pS->huv();
468  CPoint2 d1 = CPoint2( 0, 2.0 * pL->huv()[1] );
469 
470  std::complex<double> c0( d0[0], d0[1] );
471  std::complex<double> c1( d1[0], d1[1] );
472 
473  rho = c0/c1;
474  }
475  else
476  {
477  _embed_two_faces( pM, pE );
478 
479  H * pH = pM->edgeHalfedge( pE, 0 );
480  H * pN = pM->faceNextCcwHalfEdge( pH );
481  H * pD = pM->edgeHalfedge( pE, 1 );
482  H * pW = pM->faceNextCcwHalfEdge( pD );
483 
484  V * pS = pM->halfedgeSource( pH );
485  V * pT = pM->halfedgeTarget( pH );
486  V * pL = pM->halfedgeTarget( pN );
487  V * pR = pM->halfedgeTarget( pW );
488 
489  CPoint2 d0 = pT->huv() - pS->huv();
490  CPoint2 d1 = pL->huv() - pR->huv();
491 
492  std::complex<double> c0( d0[0], d0[1] );
493  std::complex<double> c1( d1[0], d1[1] );
494 
495  rho = c0/c1;
496  }
497 
498  return rho;
499 };

501 //template<typename M, typename V, typename E, typename F, typename H>
502 template< class M, class V, class E, class F, class H > // Added by Dillon 2017/08/22
503 void CStructure<M, V,E,F,H>::_metric_2_diagonal_ratio()
504 {
505  for( typename M::MeshEdgeIterator eiter( m_pMesh ); !eiter.end(); eiter ++ )
506  {
507  E * pE = *eiter;
508  std::complex<double> rho = _diagonal_ratio( m_pMesh, pE );
509  pE->rho()= rho;
510  }
511 };

515 //template<typename M, typename V, typename E, typename F, typename H>
516 template< class M, class V, class E, class F, class H > // Added by Dillon 2017/08/22
517 void CStructure<M, V,E,F,H>::_parameter_mu_2_angle( )
518 {
519  for( typename M::MeshFaceIterator fiter( m_pMesh ); ! fiter.end(); fiter ++ )
520  {
521  F * f = * fiter;
522 
523  H * hs[3];
524  int i = 0;
525  for( typename M::FaceHalfedgeIterator fhiter( f ); !fhiter.end(); fhiter ++ )
526  {
527  H * h = *fhiter;
528  hs[i++] = h;
529  }
530 
531  double ls[3];
532  for( int i = 0; i < 3; i ++ )
533  {
534  H * h = hs[i];
535  V * ps = m_pMesh->halfedgeSource( h );
536  V * pt = m_pMesh->halfedgeTarget( h );
537 
538  std::complex<double> dz = pt->z() - ps->z();
539  ls[i] = std::abs( dz + f->mu() * std::conj( dz ));
540  }
541 
542  for( int i = 0; i < 3; i ++ )
543  {
544  double C = (ls[(i+1)%3] * ls[(i+1)%3] + ls[(i+2)%3] * ls[(i+2)%3] - ls[i] * ls[i])/(2*ls[(i+1)%3] * ls[(i+2)%3]);
545  C = ( C > 1)? 1:C;
546  C = ( C <-1)?-1:C;
547  hs[(i+1)%3]->angle() = acos( C );
548  }
549  }
550 };
551 
552 };
